general_feedback: I think sentence meaning order is not good for people that have dyslexia or any other type of  reading disorder, instead images are universal.

challenge_feedback: It took me longer than any other Captcha I have performed, so I would prefer different kinds.
general_feedback: This took me a long time because the sentences were long and some of the grammar was antiquated and hard to understand (as a native English speaker from America). I don't know if all of the examples were like that but I would not like to do this kind of thing as a Captcha.
It does not feel fair for people without any English knowledge of speakers of minority languages

challenge_feedback: Depends on the difficulty, but text captcha might be better, especially for visually impaired people
general_feedback: Good idea but I think the example is weird/difficult
